channel.title: Mac osx client and server tutorial request
channel.description:
my windows is set up for hosting servers but i cant use the windows for hosting any more sooooo.. i want a tutorial for making a .bat into a terminal command or somthing like that. (ooooorr) a server that is already set up for macs :cool:
(note: please dont hate on macs -.- and if you dont know were to find a tut or you dont know how to do this)
i am currently runnning: mac osx leopard (soon to be snow leopard) [br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 16, 2009, 07:57:28 pm[/size][hr]oo and if you can please post a silab client that works with macs too?
